radiographic_examinations.findings: Low lung volumes; unremarkable mediastinal and hilar contours; free intraperitoneal air noted under each hemidiaphragm; air in the stomach and splenic flexure of the colon; small air-fluid level over the gallbladder fossa; opacity with air bronchograms in the left lower lobe suggestive of atelectasis or pneumonia; no effusion or pneumothorax.
